snippet: With the U.S. gay marriage battle looking increasingly like a lost cause for conservative opponents, a last battleground may be their quest to allow people to refuse services to gay men and women on religious grounds....

headline.print_headline: Gay Marriage Opponents Pick New Battleground of Religious Freedom
headline.main: Gay Marriage Opponents Pick New Battleground of Religious Freedom

lead_paragraph: With the U.S. gay marriage battle looking increasingly like a lost cause for conservative opponents, a last battleground may be their quest to allow people to refuse services to gay men and women on religious grounds.
